titles.title: For the relief of Rodney Allan Green and Wendy Sharon Green.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 6/4/2002--Introduced. Declares Rodney Allan Green and Wendy Sharon Green to each be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
